summary: Scanlan trained himself to speak without his accent, the one he shares with Kaylie, but early in the morning when he just wakes...
body: Scanlan trained himself to speak without his accent, the one he shares with Kaylie, but early in the morning when he just wakes up, or after getting heavily drunk, it comes out. Pike is absolutely delighted in the morning when she hears it while trying to wake him up.

reblog.comment: Scanlan trained himself to speak without his accent, the one he shares with Kaylie, but early in the morning when he just wakes up, or after getting heavily drunk, it comes out. Pike is absolutely delighted in the morning when she hears it while trying to wake him up.

summary: There should be an unofficial rule that if you lose a second character less then ten episodes from losing your first character...
body:
There should be an unofficial rule that if you lose a second character less then ten episodes from losing your first character then a magically convenient high level cleric appears outside of wherever they are and offers to res whoever they want completely for free.

…it’s only fair.

reblog.comment:
There should be an unofficial rule that if you lose a second character less then ten episodes from losing your first character then a magically convenient high level cleric appears outside of wherever they are and offers to res whoever they want completely for free.

…it’s only fair.

tags: gods my headcanon for eodwulf is so. complicated an hyper-specific
I don't even know how to properly communicate it succinctly
I guess this comic is meant to be like. a sparknotes for the basic high concept?
like. he's well loved and widely liked by his peers
and presents a very friendly and enthusiastic demeanor
and that part of him is not a lie or falsehood by any means but
to caleb and astrid (who know him the best) there is definitely a deeply frightening if not downright sinister edge to his heart
just weirdly fond of my doofy little headcanons for this trio ;v;
also sheesh I'm so bad at comics formatting xAx;;
I need to do some serious studying. esp with lettering layouts this is a mess

summary: Caduceus Clay is just SO aesthetically pleasing. I can't stop drawing him. His colors are so satisfying and easy to look at. I...
body:
Caduceus Clay is just SO aesthetically pleasing. I can’t stop drawing him. His colors are so satisfying and easy to look at. I get a heavy Sanrio vibe from him as well. His pallet has a Little Twin Stars feel to it.

I had to swatch every pink writing implement I owned to find something similar to this boy’s hair color. Ended up with having to mix my pink and white prizmacolors.

Yet again something original from my Instagram. Go check that out for the original post.

reblog.comment:

blog.name: mollymauk-teafleak
blog.title: I’m always ready to make a damn fool of myself
blog.description: liz | mainly Hamilton, TAZ, Critical Role fic | requests open | header by dicethetics | i love my girlfriend | 22

summary: ummmmmm please share more of that delicious angst for the courtesan au please??
question: ummmmmm please share more of that delicious angst for the courtesan au please??
answer:
Your wish is my command because um, yes, I am proud of this angst

  • It was Marion who had to gently suggest to Molly the reason why he’s been throwing up all week and why he’s not been sleeping right and why he’s been crying constantly. Molly suspected, of course he did, but he just couldn’t bear to think of it and when Marion finally says it to him, as gently as he can, he just falls apart. 
  • To Mollymauk, this spells the end of anything he ever could have had with Caleb. He can’t see any other way this goes except Caleb being furious and cutting all ties with him, disappearing back up to that high palace on the hill and never ever wanting to see him again. And he’s left alone, with a baby he has no idea how to take care of, unable to work, unable to make a living for himself. 
  • There is a quiet moment that Molly has to himself, when he’s sitting sadly on his window seat, too sad and too exhausted to sleep, his stomach roiling. Its that moment when it hits him that he really has got an actual life growing inside him, an actual person he never asked for but now they’re here and, yes, he loves them. Despite everything, he loves them with all his heart. For the first time in weeks, he cries with something other than sadness and runs his hand over his stomach, promising that he will find a way to give them a good life, whatever that means. 
  • Marion puts a firm end to some of those worries, promising Molly that whatever goes down with Caleb, he will always have a home in her establishment and he can have all the time he needs, even if he never wants to work again, that’s absolutely fine by her. He is part of her family and so is this baby and they will be taken care of. 
  • When Caleb eventually does find out, when Molly whispers through his tears, begging him please not to hate him, Caleb realises that Molly is the only thing that’s ever brought him any joy and he’ll be damned if he lets it slip through his fingers because of some dusty old laws and institutions that have done nothing but make him miserable and stressed. He just goes forward and hugs him so tight and finally, finally tells him that he loves him. 
  • Molly moves in with Caleb in quick succession. Marion is of course devastated to see him go and makes him promise to bring her grandbaby to visit her, which makes Molly smile. She sends him off with a gift, a fantastically coloured and patterned robe for him to wear, one that will accommodate a growing belly and a little baby blanket made of the exact same material. 
  • When Molly sees Caleb’s apartments, open and airy and the perfect home for a growing family, Molly just bursts into tears. He’s wanted this so, so much, a place for him to be Caleb’s and Caleb to be his and he just never thought he’d ever get it. But now he does and it’s just so nice, he has so much hope for the future

tags: uhhh i guess i'll just tag the giant eye as...
summary:
Beau: Hey bro, what do you want to eat?
Fjord's Patron, in his head: The souls of the innocent!
Fjord: A bagel.
Fjord's Patron:...
body:
Beau: Hey bro, what do you want to eat?
Fjord's Patron, in his head: The souls of the innocent!
Fjord: A bagel.
Fjord's Patron: Nooooo!!
Fjord: ... Two bagels.

dialogue.name: Beau
dialogue.label: Beau:
dialogue.phrase: Hey bro, what do you want to eat?
